job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Site Reliability Engineer Excellent opportunity to be part of this high growth business unit transforming on premise applications to Google Cloud Platform.  You will work with a dedicated team to design, configure, deploy, and support enterprise applications to GCP in a large, data intensive environment.  RESPONSIBILITIES: Work with business and IT team to transform enterprise applications from on prem to GCPDesign, configure, deploy, and triage applications into productionCode deployment utilizing terraformCI/CD Write scripts, performance monitoringSupport and on call duties Document new processesThis is an excellent 6+ month contract opportunity working with a high growth business unit as they transform to GCP. Outstanding opportunity to learn and grow your skills in a team that is seeking innovation in product and technology. Potential for conversion to full time employment. Ideally in Saint Louis or Atlanta but you can work 100% remotely.  REQUIRED SKILLS:5+ years as an SRE - Site Reliability Engineer GCP - 1 year - experience deploying code to cloud platformsExperience deploying/supporting .Net/C# applications Windows and related scripting skills in PowerShell, Python, or BashKnowledge of CI/CD, Jenkins pipelinesExcellent troubleshooting skills and a problem-solver mindset  PREFERRED SKILLS:Kubernetes - certifications GKE AppDynamics
